accommodations.name: Four Seasons Safari Lodge Serengeti
accommodations.description: Luxury safari lodge with infinity pool, world-class spa, and private balconies overlooking a watering hole where wildlife congregates daily. Elevated platforms provide spectacular game viewing opportunities.

accommodations.name: Singita Sasakwa Lodge
accommodations.description: Award-winning Edwardian manor-style lodge with Persian carpets, vintage collectibles, and unparalleled old-world luxury charm in the Grumeti Game Reserve.

accommodations.name: Serengeti Serena Safari Lodge
accommodations.description: Stone-built rondavels with infinity pool on an acacia ridge, offering award-winning service and stunning savanna views.

accommodations.name: Bawe Island Resort
accommodations.description: Newly opened luxury resort featuring 70 villas with private pools and butler service on a pristine private island setting.

accommodations.name: Zawadi Hotel Zanzibar
accommodations.description: Adults-only boutique hotel with 12 cliffside villas offering all-inclusive luxury and breathtaking Indian Ocean views.

accommodations.name: Park Hyatt Zanzibar
accommodations.description: Award-winning hotel in historic Stone Town with aquamarine sea views, recognized as Best Hotel Interior in Africa.

accommodations.name: Ngorongoro Crater Lodge
accommodations.description: Dramatic luxury lodge perched on crater rim with spectacular views into Africa's most famous volcanic caldera.

accommodations.name: Tarangire Safari Lodge
accommodations.description: Comfortable lodge overlooking the Tarangire River with excellent elephant viewing opportunities and traditional architecture.

accommodations.name: Kigelia Ruaha
accommodations.description: Remote luxury camp in pristine wilderness setting with exceptional game viewing and walking safari opportunities.

accommodations.name: Lake Manyara Tree Lodge
accommodations.description: Unique tree-house style accommodation in the heart of mahogany forest with exclusive access to Lake Manyara National Park.

destinations.name: Serengeti National Park
destinations.description: Home to the Great Migration and Tanzania's highest concentration of big cats. Witness millions of wildebeest, zebras, and gazelles in their annual journey across endless plains.

destinations.name: Ngorongoro Conservation Area
destinations.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring the world's largest inactive volcanic crater with the highest concentration of wildlife in Africa.
destinations.bestTime: Year-round destination with excellent wildlife viewing

destinations.name: Tarangire National Park
destinations.description: Famous for massive elephant herds and ancient baobab trees. The Tarangire River attracts diverse wildlife during the dry season.
destinations.bestTime: June-October when animals concentrate along the river

destinations.name: Lake Manyara National Park
destinations.description: Renowned for its unique tree-climbing lions and diverse ecosystems, from dense rainforest to alkaline lake with flamingo flocks.
destinations.bestTime: Year-round, with November-June best for flamingos

destinations.name: Ruaha National Park
destinations.description: Tanzania's largest park with over 12,000 elephants and 10% of the world's lion population. A truly wild, untouched wilderness experience.
destinations.bestTime: June-October dry season for best game viewing

destinations.name: Zanzibar Island
destinations.description: Historic Spice Island with pristine beaches, UNESCO Stone Town, and luxury resorts overlooking the Indian Ocean.

itineraries.name: Ngorongoro Day Trip
itineraries.description: Experience the world's largest inactive volcanic crater in a single day. Witness incredible wildlife density including the Big Five in this natural wonder.

itineraries.name: Tanzania Wildlife Safari
itineraries.description: Comprehensive wildlife experience covering Serengeti, Ngorongoro, and Tarangire. Perfect introduction to Tanzania's incredible biodiversity and landscapes.

itineraries.name: Tarangire National Park Daytrip
itineraries.description: Explore the land of giants with massive elephant herds and ancient baobab trees in Tanzania's sixth-largest national park.

itineraries.name: Wilderness Escape Safari
itineraries.description: Perfect short safari combining key Northern Circuit parks with excellent wildlife viewing and comfortable accommodations.

itineraries.name: Classic Tanzania Safari: Tarangire, Serengeti & Ngorongoro
itineraries.description: Experience Tanzania's three crown jewels - Tarangire, Serengeti, and Ngorongoro in one incredible journey.

itineraries.name: Southern Tanzania Safari Escape
itineraries.description: Explore the remote Southern Circuit with Ruaha National Park and exclusive luxury accommodations away from crowds.

itineraries.name: Tanzania's Southern Circuit Experience
itineraries.description: Introduction to Tanzania's Southern Circuit parks with excellent value and authentic wilderness experiences.

itineraries.name: Oldoinyo Lengai Trekking
itineraries.description: Challenging trek up the sacred 'Mountain of God' - the world's only active natrocarbonatite volcano.

itineraries.name: Marangu Route
itineraries.description: The 'Coca-Cola Route' - Kilimanjaro's most popular path with comfortable hut accommodations and gradual ascent.

itineraries.name: Mount Meru Hiking
itineraries.description: Tanzania's second-highest mountain offering excellent acclimatization for Kilimanjaro and spectacular views.

itineraries.name: Machame Route
itineraries.description: The 'Whiskey Route' - more challenging than Marangu with stunning scenery and higher success rates.

itineraries.name: Lemosho Route
itineraries.description: The most scenic Kilimanjaro route with excellent acclimatization and high success rates through diverse landscapes.
